name: Lost Secret
description:
Game Introduction

You don't know how to come to such a secret room, a shadow wearing a mask, a candle that will go out at some point, either get lost in the secret room or find a way to escape.

 Author's thoughts on development

The game was born out of a two-week GameJam. This is my first time making a horror style game. It's not easy to make a game by just one person, I hope everyone likes it.

游戏简介

你不知如何来到的这样一间密室，一个戴着面具的黑影，一支不知什么时候会熄灭的蜡烛，要么在密室中迷失要么想办法逃离吧。

作者的话

这款游戏诞生于为期两周的 GameJam。 这是我第一次制作恐怖风格的游戏。 一个人做游戏不容易，希望大家喜欢。
